mapper.insert: insert into P_PROFIT_D (ID, AGENT_PID, AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, TRANS_DATE, REMIT_DATE, TOTAL_PROFIT,TOTAL_PROFIT1, FROZEN_MONEY, SUCCESS_MONEY, FAIL_MONEY, REAL_MONEY, REDO_MONEY, RETURN_MONEY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{successMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{failMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redoMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PROFIT) FROM P_PROFIT_D where to_date(substr(TRANS_DATE,0,6),'yyyymm') = to_date(#{transDate},'yyyymm') AND AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PROFIT+TOTAL_PROFIT1) FROM P_PROFIT_D where to_date(substr(TRANS_DATE,0,6),'yyyymm') = to_date(#{transDate},'yyyymm') AND AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT SUM(RETURN_MONEY) FROM P_PROFIT_D where to_date(substr(TRANS_DATE,0,6),'yyyymm') = to_date(#{transDate},'yyyymm') AND AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PROFIT1) FROM P_PROFIT_D where to_date(substr(TRANS_DATE,0,6),'yyyymm') = to_date(#{transDate},'yyyymm') AND AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PROFIT+TOTAL_PROFIT1+RETURN_MONEY) FROM P_PROFIT_D where to_date(substr(TRANS_DATE,0,6),'yyyymm') = to_date(#{transDate},'yyyymm') AND AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update P_PROFIT_D
AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_DATE = #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMIT_DATE = #{remitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_PROFIT = #{totalProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PROFIT1 = #{totalProfit1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FROZEN_MONEY = #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUCCESS_MONEY = #{successMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAIL_MONEY = #{failMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REAL_MONEY = #{realMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REDO_MONEY = #{redoMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_MONEY = #{returnMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update P_PROFIT_D set AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_DATE = #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMIT_DATE = #{remitDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_PROFIT = #{totalProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_PROFIT1 = #{totalProfit1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FROZEN_MONEY = #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUCCESS_MONEY = #{successMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAIL_MONEY = #{failMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REAL_MONEY = #{realMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REDO_MONEY = #{redoMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURN_MONEY = #{returnMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
